translation.en: [narrator] In the beginning, there was only the Primordial Mind.
From this mind sprang the whole of creation.
The stars, the planets, life and death.
But in time, the Mind was divided against itself.
Two fragments, the Radiant and the Dire, thought and action,
translation.ko: 두 조각, 래디언트와 다이어 생각과 행동은

translation.en: warred over creation with irreconcilable ferocity.
translation.ko: 양립할 수 없는 흉포함으로 만물을 둘러싸고 싸웠다

translation.en: The Chaos of the Infinite followed.
[narrator] Kings, queens.
Gods. Monsters.
They all sought wisdom in the shattered Primordial Mind
translation.ko: 모두 조각난 태고의 정신에서 지혜를 얻으려 했고

translation.en: and power from its ineffable madness.
translation.ko: 그 형언할 수 없는 광기로부터 힘을 얻으려 했다

translation.en: But in his prison in Foulfell,
the demon Terrorblade gazed into the chaos and found Truth.
translation.ko: 악마 테러블레이드는 혼돈을 지켜보고 진리를 깨달았다

translation.en: Terrorblade found the idea.
Fuse thought and action.
Remake creation in his own infernal image.
translation.ko: 그 자신의 지옥의 모습으로 만물을 재창조한다

translation.en: Bram.
[Frühling] What the hell is he doing?
Why isn't he killing the damn thing?
translation.ko: 왜 저 망할 것을 안 죽이지?

translation.en: Quiet. Watch the man work.
[Bram] He's not coming out.
They always come out.
[Davion] Crazy, stupid…
Here we go.
-Piece of shit! -Hey!
Dishonor my kill again, you're next.
translation.ko: 내가 죽인 용을 또 모욕하면 다음은 당신 차례야

translation.en: Dishonor it?
Fucking thing killed four of mine, injured at least five more.
translation.ko: 이 망할 것이 내 부하 넷을 죽이고 족히 다섯은 다치게 했어

translation.en: Gods! Another one!
Hatchling. Dead.
Hatchlings. Pups. Wee babies.
[scoffs] Bite your face off, boyo.
[Davion] The entire nest… it's gone.
They tore each other apart. It's like they all went crazy.
translation.ko: 서로를 갈기갈기 찢어놨어 모조리 미친 것 같아

translation.en: Like they all lost their minds and turned on one another, all at once.
Crazy wyrmlings, crazy hatchlings… I'm sure it's fine.
translation.ko: 미친 유체고룡에 미친 해츨링들이라 괜찮을 거예요

translation.en: This nest, it opens up.
Bram.
[Bram] An eldwyrm dug this. Asleep.
How do you know?
We're not dead. Asleep, then.
Lovely.
Now is our chance. Now we kill the beast.
No. Now we pray he doesn't wake up.
And when, pray you, do we return to kill the big one?
translation.ko: 그래서, 아까 그 큰 놈은 언제 죽일 건데?

translation.en: "Kill the big one?"
Do you know how many living Dragon Knights
translation.ko: 배 속에 불이 있는 큰 놈을 보고도

translation.en: have ever seen a "big one" that still had fire in its guts?
translation.ko: 살아 있는 용기사가 몇이나 되는지 알아요?

translation.en: Or whatever they have in their guts, it varies from dragon to dragon.
translation.ko: 배 속에 뭐가 있든 간에요 그건 용마다 다르니까

translation.en: Bram. One. That's how many.
Ah, you're afraid, then.
We'll ride for Dragon Hold in the morning. Get advice, find help.
translation.ko: 아침에 용 요새로 가서 조언을 구하고 도움을 청할 거지만

translation.en: But tonight, I plan to celebrate the fact that I'm still breathing.
translation.ko: 오늘 밤은 아직 살아 있다는 걸 축하할 계획이야

translation.en: As should you. You especially.
[scoffs] Coward.
[Bram] All these people… Just for you.
translation.ko: 이 모든 사람이 당신을 위해서 나왔어요

translation.en: [Davion] For that.
This morning they were terrified, tonight they feel safe.
translation.ko: 아침에는 두려움에 떨었는데 오늘 밤엔 안심이니까

translation.en: All I'm doing is delivering their trophy.
-Davion! -Davion!
Oh, no. Not for you.
All right. It's a little bit for me.
Your father was a militian.
-Yes, sir. -He was a brave son of a bitch.
You look like you're a brave son of a bitch, too.
Like him.
Here. I want you to have this. Dragon fang.
I've got one just like it. See?
When you're of age, when you're ready, take yours to Dragon Hold.
translation.ko: 나이가 되고 준비가 되면 그걸 용 요새로 가져가렴

translation.en: They'll know what it means.
I'll slay monsters too someday. Just like father.
translation.ko: 저도 언젠가 괴물을 죽일 거예요 아버지처럼요

translation.en: Just like father.
[Bram] Davion leaped left, he leaped right.
Bobbing and weaving as the great beast lunged and snapped!
translation.ko: 커다란 짐승이 달려들고 무는 걸 재빠르게 이리저리 빠져나갔죠!

translation.en: Finally, knowing it was beaten, the dragon fled under the earth!
translation.ko: 결국 패배했다는 걸 알고 용은 땅속으로 도망쳤어요!

translation.en: Davion followed.
There, alone in the darkness, he slew the beast!
translation.ko: 그 어둠 속에서 홀로 다비온은 짐승을 죽였어요!

translation.en: When we found him, covered in the enemy's black, stinking blood,
translation.ko: 적의 검고 냄새나는 피를 뒤집어쓰고 있더군요

translation.en: he said, "Tonight, we dine! Tonight, we drink!
translation.ko: 다비온은 말했죠 '오늘 밤, 우리는 먹고 마신다!'

translation.en: The village is saved!"
Of course, I played a critical role.
He'd have been dead a hundred times if I weren't there.
A hundred times? A hundred times at least.
At least!
Worry not. I'll return with fresh cups for everyone.
translation.ko: 걱정 마요, 내가 모두를 위해 새로 한 잔 돌리고 올 테니

translation.en: -Barkeep, another round. -Excuse me.
translation.ko: - 주인장, 한 잔씩 더 돌리지 - 이봐

translation.en: I was waiting.
Forgive me. I'm in my cups. I didn't see you there.
translation.ko: 미안, 취해서 서 있는 걸 못 봤네

translation.en: Please, help the lady. Thank you.
An Icewrack white, please.
Two glasses, chilled of course, not so sharp.
translation.ko: 잔은 두 개, 차가워야 하고 너무 톡 쏘지 않게

translation.en: -[clanks] -Two crowns.
It smells terrible. And it's warm.
It's beer. It's all we got.
translation.ko: 그야 맥주니까 당연하지 이것 말곤 없어

translation.en: Wet, sour and sharp enough to cut the head off a hellbear.
translation.ko: 헬베어 목을 벨 만큼 시큼하고 톡 쏘는 맛이지

translation.en: -Smells like mom. -But…
-Two crowns. -For this?
-I'll pay for her Icewrack white. -Oh, uh, in that case, they're free.
translation.ko: - 이분 술은 내가 사지 - 그렇다면 공짜야

translation.en: Wait. If I order, it's two crowns. If he orders, he pays nothing.
translation.ko: 잠깐, 내가 주문하면 2크라운인데 이 사람이 주문하면 공짜라고?

translation.en: Well, yeah. He's Davion the fucking Dragon Knight what killed a fucking dragon.
translation.ko: 당연하지, 망할 용을 죽인 망할 용기사 다비온이니까

translation.en: -This fucking dragon. -Among others.
translation.ko: - 이 망할 용 말이야 - 이 외에도 여럿 있지

translation.en: Many, I'm sure.
But the one, the big one, you left down in that gods-empty hole!
translation.ko: 하지만 그 큰 놈은 텅 빈 구멍에 남겨두고 왔잖아!

translation.en: -Don't talk much about him. -You're drunk.
translation.ko: - 그놈 얘기는 많이 안 하네 - 취했군

translation.en: Tell her all about it.
Tell her how you bravely ran away.
If all your stories were worth a steaming sod,
translation.ko: 네 이야기들이 모두 믿을 만한 거라면

translation.en: you'd be killing that thing. Listen up, idiot.
translation.ko: - 네가 그걸 죽였겠지 - 잘 들어, 등신아

translation.en: One man alone can't kill an eldwyrm, nor 10, nor 20.
translation.ko: 혼자서 장로고룡을 죽일 순 없어 10명도, 20명도 안 돼

translation.en: It would be stupid to try.
Waking that monster means death for everyone within miles of here.
translation.ko: 그 괴물을 깨웠다간 이 근방 사람이 다 죽어

translation.en: Let the dragon sleep.
Now, if you'll sod right off, I was talking to the… lady.
translation.ko: 이제 꺼져주면 좋겠군 숙녀분과 얘기하던 중이라

translation.en: Shit. Ah! She thinks you're a coward, too.
translation.ko: - 젠장 - 아가씨도 널 겁쟁이로 본 거지

translation.en: Icewrack white.
It's supposed to be warm.
A human tavern. [Mirana] Barely.
translation.ko: - 인간 여관이라 - 아닌 것도 껴 있지

translation.en: [Gwanwyn] This isn't exactly neutral.
I assume you would've preferred a dark alley or the foothills.
translation.ko: 너한텐 어두운 골목이나 언덕이 더 좋았겠지

translation.en: The better to rob me. Rob you? [sighs]
Locating precious things for the wealthy is more lucrative than stealing from them.
translation.ko: 부자들 귀중품을 찾아주는 게 훔치는 것보다 더 짭짤하다고

translation.en: My lotuses.
Selemene's lotuses. The usurper's lotuses.
I don't really care.
I care only to make them mine now. I don't have your lotuses.
translation.ko: - 내가 되찾기만 하면 돼 - 연꽃은 나한테 없어

translation.en: What I do have is a name. Travel to the Black Market in Haupstadt.
translation.ko: 내가 아는 건 이름뿐이야 하우프슈타트의 암시장으로 가서

translation.en: Ask for Nikdo. He'll arrange the rest.
translation.ko: 닉도를 찾아 나머지는 알아서 해줄 테니

translation.en: You promised to bring them. [Gwanwyn] I promised to find them.
Now, the matter of my payment. I'm not paying for a name.
translation.ko: - 이제 보수 얘기를 하자고 - 고작 이름에 줄 돈은 없어

translation.en: Then I'll find Nikdo and tell him there's no bargain.
translation.ko: 그럼 내가 닉도를 찾아서 거래는 없다고 전하지

translation.en: Safe travels, miss. Wait.
I don't have money.
But I do have other items of value. Oh, sorry. Not interested.
translation.ko: - 그만한 가치의 물건이 있어 - 미안, 관심 없어

translation.en: Human women are pleasantly soft, but too easy to come by.
translation.ko: 인간 여자는 부드러워서 좋지만 지천에 널려 있거든

translation.en: That's not my offer. This.
This bracelet. Your tiara.
I know who you are.
[banging] Ah! My future ex-wife.
And my other future ex-wife. Huh? [laughs]
translation.ko: 내 마누라 될 여자가 하나 더 있네

translation.en: Never come down from the throne to address a peasant.
translation.ko: 하찮은 놈 상대하려고 손을 더럽히지 마

translation.en: Oh, I see. Skinny bastard is your boyfriend.
Been stepping out on me, huh? Snogging my future ex-wife, are we?
translation.ko: 감히 얻다 발을 올려? 내 마누라 될 여자를 물고 빨아?

translation.en: Believe me when I tell you, I would never dare tread
where you've set foot or anything else.
Ah! Insulting me now, huh?
-Elf! Filthy spawn of tree rot. -[villagers gasp]
Long-eared murderous animal.
Cousin of mine wandered into one of your enclaves once.
translation.ko: 내 사촌이 길을 잃고 너희 땅에 들어갔다가

translation.en: Came out half-mad, minus an arm and two balls.
translation.ko: 반쯤 미쳐서 나왔지 팔 하나랑 불알 두 짝을 잃고

translation.en: Elves cut him a smile ear to ear.
translation.ko: 엘프들이 내 사촌을 귀에서 귀까지 찢어놨어

translation.en: [Davion] Wait here.
He's holding me in reserve.
Think I'll cut you one to match it.
Enough talk.
I'll handle this animal myself.
[Davion] This seems like the right place to drop the garbage.
translation.ko: 쓰레기를 버리기엔 여기가 딱 좋아 보이는군

translation.en: Run.
Now, while you can.
Nikdo. In Haupstadt, Princess.
Princess?
You get more interesting by the minute.
Most men would've left him to the mob. Most men would've joined it.
translation.ko: 보통 남자라면 내버려 두거나 같이 두들겨 팼을 텐데

translation.en: I'm not most men. Barkeep!
Another round for all my friends!
"Princess."
[grumbles] I'm not afraid of any dragon!
Hear me! I'm not afraid of you!
translation.ko: 잘 들어! 난 너희가 두렵지 않다고!

translation.en: [grunts] Not afraid.
[Terrorblade] Not afraid?
I can still smell the piss on your leg.
translation.ko: 네 다리에선 아직도 오줌 냄새가 나는데

translation.en: Everyone knows.
Everyone laughs at you, Captain.
Shut up.
[Terrorblade] You're the joke of the village.
Sad and pathetic.
A coward.
Shut up!
[Terrorblade] Rage. Yes.
Oh, we can use that.
Yes, we can.
We can slay that beast. You and I.
translation.ko: 그 짐승을 죽일 수 있어 너와 내가 함께

translation.en: And no one ever has to know your secret terror.
translation.ko: 네가 감춘 두려움은 아무도 몰라도 된다

translation.en: Your impotence. I'll do all the work.
translation.ko: 너의 무력함도 내가 다 알아서 할 테니

translation.en: All you have to do… is let me in.
Did you want another go?
No. Not really. I, I just… It's fine. I'm fine.
Sleep, lovely.
-You don't even know my name, do you? -[Bram] Davion!
It's all right. I know yours. -Davion. -[Bram] Davion!
translation.ko: - 괜찮아, 난 당신 이름 아니까 - 다비온!

translation.en: Davion, wake up! Gods' mercy, Bram, I hear you.
translation.ko: - 다비온, 일어나요! - 맙소사, 브램, 잘 들려

translation.en: -[Davion] Come in. -Oh, finally!
Searched every room for you. I woke up half the…
translation.ko: 온 방을 다 뒤졌어요 여관 사람 절반은 깨웠…

translation.en: [chuckles] Hey, ma'am. It's Captain Frühling. He's gone to the foothills.
[Davion] Moron. Brainless, arrogant… He means to kill the eldwyrm.
translation.ko: - 멍청이, 어리석고 오만한 놈 - 그 장로고룡을 죽이려는 거예요

translation.en: I'm going after him. I'll try to stop him. One way or another.
translation.ko: 내가 쫓아간다 무슨 수를 써서라도 막아볼게

translation.en: -I'm coming with you. -[Davion] You won't.
translation.ko: - 같이 가요 - 넌 안 돼, 용 요새로 가

translation.en: Go to Dragon Hold. The Fathers need to know.
translation.ko: - 같이 가요 - 넌 안 돼, 용 요새로 가 아버지들께서 아셔야 해 모조리 보내셔야 한다고

translation.en: They need to send everyone.
translation.ko: 아버지들께서 아셔야 해 모조리 보내셔야 한다고

translation.en: [sighs] Always hated this part.
[Bram] Oh, shit.
[Bram] Hoping I show up in Dragon Hold with a head.
translation.ko: 머리가 달린 채로 용 요새에 도착해야 할 텐데

translation.en: And both arms. And they'll both be mine.
translation.ko: 두 팔도 멀쩡히 달려 있어야 할 텐데

translation.en: Eridu.
How?
Frühling.
Dragon Knight, we do the gods' work here.
translation.ko: 용기사여, 우리는 여기서 신의 일을 하는 거다

translation.en: You and I, we should be friends.
Friends? Frühling, what did you do?
translation.ko: 친구? 프륄링, 무슨 짓을 한 거야?

translation.en: No man is capable of… this.
translation.ko: 이런 게 가능한 사람이 - 있을 리가 - 울도락은 늙고 병들었다

translation.en: Uldorak was old. Sick.
Yet even his powers at their height could not have saved him.
Not from me.
What in the Seven Hells?
Your voice. Your eyes…
[Davion] Gods. Tell me, Dragon Knight, Davion.
If you could do what has been done,
translation.ko: 네가 이런 걸 할 수 있다면

translation.en: if you had the power, wouldn't you take it?
The little boy who stood frozen as his father burned alive.
translation.ko: 아버지가 산 채로 불탈 때 얼어붙었던 소년이여

translation.en: I was just a child. How do you--?
Childhood evaporated with your father's flesh.
translation.ko: 아버지의 살과 함께 증발해 버린 어린 시절이지

translation.en: A boy made man by your despair.
Your rage. I know you.
I see you, trapped in your own hell of regret.
translation.ko: 네가 보인다 네 후회의 지옥에 갇혀 있군

translation.en: What wouldn't you do to escape?
-[Davion] You know nothing. -I know this much.
Together, we can slay dragons.
translation.ko: 우리가 함께하면 용을 죽일 수 있다

translation.en: Every dragon.
All you have to do is let me in.
[Slyrak] You will release Uldorak's soul
translation.ko: 너는 울도락의 영혼을 해방하게 될 것이다

translation.en: so he may rejoin the Thunder and take new form.
translation.ko: 울도락이 천둥으로 돌아가 새 형체를 갖추도록

translation.en: [Terrorblade through Frühling] Slyrak.
Father of Fire.
The Thunder speaks and chooses you to give it voice.
translation.ko: 천둥이 입을 열어 너에게 목소리를 전했군

translation.en: I'll collect your soul as I collected Uldorak's.
translation.ko: 울도락의 영혼처럼 네 영혼도 내가 갖겠다

translation.en: [Slyrak] Uldorak was ready for death. The madness was upon him. The weakness.
translation.ko: 울도락은 죽을 때가 되었다 광기에 휩싸여 약해졌지

translation.en: I am not so disadvantaged.
[Slyrak] Run, little mouse.
Count yourself fortunate I have no taste for manflesh today.
translation.ko: 오늘 인육이 안 당기는 걸 다행으로 여겨라

translation.en: [Terrorblade] Dragons.
No imagination.
All brute force.
No cunning.
No guile.
Weak.
Fuck.
I smell your fear.
Only my hate!
[Slyrak] Brave little mouse.
The demon…
Fled to the hell he calls home.
Uldorak, his soul lost.
I couldn't just let him…
I… You chose a side.
translation.ko: - 나는… - 어느 편에 설지 선택한 거다

translation.en: [Davion] Sleep, dragon.
Die in peace. I want nothing of peace, little mouse.
translation.ko: - 평화롭게 잠들어라 - 평화 따위는 원치 않는다

translation.en: You know of the death I want.
translation.ko: 내가 어떤 죽음을 바라는지 않지 않느냐

translation.en: You fought well.
You honor me.
As you honor me.
[Slyrak] Forgive me, little mouse.
For all the suffering you will now endure.
[Mirana] Drunk and naked.
The best help I could offer is to let him sleep,
translation.ko: 자게 내버려 두는 게 도와주는 거야

translation.en: and when he wakes, understand he must make better life choices.
translation.ko: 일어나면 정신 좀 차리고 살라고 훈수나 두고 말지

translation.en: It's not my responsibility to protect people from themselves,
translation.ko: 제 몸 망치는 사람 보호하는 건 내 책임이 아니야

translation.en: no matter what good and noble qualities they might possess.
translation.ko: 그게 얼마나 훌륭하고 고결한 사람이든 간에

translation.en: Don't look at me that way, Marci.
You can't possibly know he would come to my aid if the tables were turned.
translation.ko: 서로 상황이 바뀌었을 때 날 도와줄지는 모르는 거야

translation.en: Which they never would be. I should hardly need to tell you.
translation.ko: 상황이 바뀔 일도 없지 말할 필요도 없지만

translation.en: Fine.
Get him up, but put a cloak on him for decency's sake.
You will not be happy when you awaken, Davion the Dragon Knight.
translation.ko: 깨어나면 기분이 썩 좋진 않겠어 용기사 다비온

translation.en: [Mirana] But you'll live.
